item.description:
We will meet first for Happy hour at 6pm at Bear and Grill to listen to our very own favorite Tom (the "Bomb") - then around 7:30 we will head over to Barcelona for Tapas and cocktails as we enjoy the lively and funfilled (crazy) atmosphere at Barcelona - put on your dancing shoes and lets boogie down the road ( We can carpool down there) from Bear&Grill.

 

Urbane, sophisticated, and lively, Barcelona Greenwich is chic fun with terrific food.  Opened in 2001, Barcelona Greenwich has been featured on ABC news as one of the New York area’s “hot spots,” and in Connecticut Magazine as a three star dining experience.  Polished service from professional waiters and managing partner Christian Petroni in the evening gives way to a lively bar scene in the late hours.
item.why: Barcelona in Greenwhich "Rocks" every time I go there its like fiesta - people are dancing on the tables and chairs. All ages are invited - for that matter all forms of Human life are invited as well :-)

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Greenwhich "Barcelona" Yea Baby :-) "Double Header"
